A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For once a Star Wars movies makes the Jedi Knights more bad ass and appieling then the Dark Side. I always identified with Han Solo or even Darth Vader but this movies seems to finally achieve it and give the Jedis a glorious outlet. I watched it twice in two very different theaters and the response and joy was both times the same. I sincerely do not understand the bad wrap it got. I think it's a great Star Wars movie. You get a lot for the price of a movie ticket!
